title: "AI firm GridBeyond expands presence in Houston, U.S. with latest acquisition"
excerpt: "With the acquisition, GridBeyond now has 27 employees in North America, including seven in Houston with plans to grow its workforce focusing on sales. The AI firm opened its Houston office in early 2020, but said it is officially making the Bayou City its U.S. headquarters. In all, GridBeyond has offices in six different countries."
